sentence:
Results
We retrieved 496 records from the search (Figure 1), including 492 from the databases and four from other sources (i.e., searching the references of the included studies).
We identified six intervention intentions describing the role of the CAs (Figure 2).
We identified studies in the development (n = 1, < 1%), feasibility (n = 8, 28%), effectiveness (n = 18, 64%), implementation (n = 1, < 1%) and commercialisation (n = 13, 46%) stages (Figure 3).
We assessed nine RCTs for risk of bias (Appendix S2) and provided a summary for the risk‐of‐bias assessment (RoB 2) in Figure 4.
